name: Decide (MiroloTech)
description:
Hi.  I made A game for the WOWIE Jam 3.  it would be nice, if you could download it.

It all started in fabric, your lovely home. But one day you... SOMETHING... You didn't know, what it was. You went to it, and suddendly your world was very glitchy. Everything lost color. You wanted to escape, but there were A lot of  obstacles. You have to get past them, put the BARRELS into the SLOTS and go to the TRANSMITTERS...

Have fun. It's very storyrich, so READ THE  DIALOG!!!

(I just had 3 days, and the spellingmistakes are  on purpose.)...
